title: Come As You Are w/ Lindsay Sloane
description:
This week we welcome the incomparable Lindsay Sloane (Bring it On, Playing House). But first June and Jess Dive Deep into why Jessica believes she is meant for the olden days, Wikifeet ratings, and missing dog drama. Then, Lindsay joins and shares her first bizarre interaction with Jessica which involved, spoiler alert, touching. The gals dig into regrets of all shapes and sizes, and Lindsay then turns the tables and asks June and Jess a few DEEP questions she wants to know. And remember, f*ck it we only have one life, you absolutely have to love it.

Don’t miss Jessica and June on The Today Show this Friday 6/25 6:30amPT

Catch Jessica defending her life on Bitch Sesh’s Red Towel Talk Thur 6/24. Get tickets here https://www.events.loopedlive.com/bitchsesh

You can follow The Deep Dive on Twitter @thedeepdivepod
June Diane Raphael @MsJuneDiane on Twitter @junediane on Instagram
Jessica St. Clair @Jessica_StClair on Twitter @stclairjessica on Instagram
Check out the Jane Club at www.janeclub.com
author: thedeepdive@earwolf.com (Earwolf & Jessica St. Clair, June Diane Rapheal)
